txt.en: 'You are late to our gathering, [placeholder]....'
'You see, the Dead have already sworn themselves to my Lord!'
'Who do you think this man to be, [placeholder]?'
'I am Azruthor, an Heir of Castamir, and servant to The Scourge.'
'Come, Azruthor, this is the one I told you of....'
'When this war ends and the kingdoms of Men lie broken, the Great Eye shall rule and the Dead will be free of their curse!'
'As you wish, my Lord.'
'Perhaps he is a corsair, but to hold such power over the Dead... I do not think it likely.'
'I need not the strength of the heir of Isildur to break this curse... only the might of the Dark Lord Sauron!'
'Your journey ends here... I will not allow you to keep us from the freedom we desire!'
Instance: A Dark Pact
'But... there were those of a long-vanished line that worshipped the Enemy and wielded vile power in his name.'
'Unlikely as it is, it could be that this man is a descendant of the Black Númenóreans.'
'While I admire your boldness in seeking an audience with me, you will not leave the vale alive.'
'There is no defeat for me, [placeholder]... it is only you who shall meet your doom in Gondor!'
'If that should be true, we would have much more to worry about than fear of the Dead.'
'Serve your master, Oathbreakers, and your curse shall be lifted!'
'I pray I am wrong, [placeholder]... but I cannot explain what I have seen thus far.'
'I leave this matter to you, Nerzus, and pray you do not fail me. Slay them where they stand!'
'As for the rest of you... you will begin to repay the Dark Lord for your betrayal in Tarlang's Crown!'
'My people have long avoided the Hill for good reason, [placeholder]...'
'...so you must forgive me if I seem a mite uneasy.'
'They are upon us! To arms!'
'I fear we shall not soon see the last of them, but we must press on! Now, what was I saying?'
'The Dead will not suffer our presence here, [placeholder]... we must fight through them.'
'We have tarried long enough! There is no sense in allowing them more time to regroup!'
'Let us wait a moment here, [placeholder]....'
'Hold, [placeholder]. The chill of death is still in the air....'
